snippet: Chemical weapons have caused only a small fraction of the deaths in Syria’s civil war, but the response they have provoked echoes that from wars around the world during the 20th century.
abstract: Memo From Europe; chemical weapons have caused only a small fraction of the deaths in Syria’s civil war, but the response they have provoked echoes that from wars around the world during the 20th century; use of chemical weapons has long been recognized as too horrible, even in war.
lead_paragraph: Chemical weapons have caused only a small fraction of the deaths in Syria’s civil war, but the response they have provoked echoes that from wars around the world during the 20th century.

headline.print_headline: A Weapon Seen as Too Horrible, Even in War
